text: Turkey Bowl may refer to one of the following sports events: *Turkey Bowl (high school), a common name for high school American football games held either on Thanksgiving or over Thanksgiving weekend *Turkey Bowl (amateur), nickname for informal backyard American football games held on Thanksgiving or over Thanksgiving weekend *Turkey bowling, a sport involving bowling with turkeys as bowling balls and soda bottles as pins *TNA Turkey Bowl, a special tournament that was aired on the Thanksgiving night episode of TNA Impact!
title: Turkey Bowl
